item.title: Comment on The Unbearable Slowness of Being: Why do we live at 10 bits/s? by Steven Wolf
item.description:
This article is basically junk science. I challenge anyone who believes in this to upload themselves to a computer and then kill themselves because you are too slow at processing. Have a good new year.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/the-unbearable-slowness-of-being-why-do-we-live-at-10-bits-s.html?commentID=160852680

item.title: Comment on Joseph Walker on Australian migration (from my email) by Alex VB
item.description:
When Australians or Canadians complain that immigrants are making housing expensive, I point to Texas as a counter point. Texas has about the same population as them, but has more immigrants (domestic plus international). Despite that Texas has kept its housing costs down. The key is that Texas allows people to build.

Texas not only gets more immigrants, domestic birth rates are higher, the immigrants are richer, and they demand larger housing than either country.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/joseph-walker-on-australian-migration-from-my-email.html?commentID=160852449

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/joseph-walker-on-australian-migration-from-my-email.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=joseph-walker-on-australian-migration-from-my-email

item.title: Comment on Joseph Walker on Australian migration (from my email) by Cassie Jones
item.description:
Was at a lunch recently where the chairman of the ABC mentioned how fed up MPs are by people accosting them about the 2nd amendment. Sadly the American 2nd amendment not the Australian one. It’s an information desert that is only inundated with American social rain.
